idea-plugin.name: base16 Dracula
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Dracula for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Mike Barkmin (http://github.com/mikebarkmin) based on Dracula Theme (http://github.com/dracula). Theme made by Tinted Theming (https://github.com/tinted-theming/base16-jetbrains)
